enable_mode_des: Allow Frankie to help you. The more you chat, the more it'll understand who you're looking for.

create_bot_des:
Add a bot with domain knowledge by signing in your GitHub account and earn. 

Your GitHub account must be linked to hugging face dataset. 

Your data must be embedded.
bot_prepublish: is ready to be publish. You can test the chat first on the next page before you publish.
onboard_page1_title: Chat with Frankie AI and Humans
onboard_page1_subtitle: You are more than a few words in a form. Frankie is the main bot at machi. It can recommend human profiles based on your conversation with it
onboard_page2_subtitle: Meet other humans and allow others to use your bot and earn
onboard_page3_subtitle: Find or offer consultation services or request chat with other humans based on Frankie's recommendation
